data.title: Article: Lightning Strikes Twice The Answer to a 10-Year Search for the Man to Play the Most Sought-After Role in Screen History! by Movie Story editors: (1951) Magazine / Periodical
data.meta_description: Magazine - Movie Story Magazine - 1951 - Condition: Very Good - No Dust Jacket - Good condition, minor discoloration due to age. ; ; 9 x 12; 5 pages; This is an article/advertisement only from a vintage journal and is not the full journal - Article: Lightning Strikes Twice The Answer to a 10-Year Search for the Man to Play the Most Sought-After Role in Screen History!

Shipping Terms:

We ship within 24 hours so if you order your book today, it will be shipped

tomorrow. Gift wrapping, if requested, is free!

We ship media mail in the US unless requests are made for faster shipping.

Overseas, it is first class or priority as requested.

If you require special shipping please specify.
